response.summary:
I am a system engineer with +5 years of experience in web development: +2 years of experience as a backend developer with Python/Django (including Django-rest-framework), +1 year working with Odoo ERP(Python for backend and common HTML tools for frontend), and +3 years of experience as frontend developer using a wide set of tools, including React, JavaScript, Typescript, HTML, CSS, SASS/SCSS, design systems libraries like NextUI, MaterialUI, and Bootstrap, global state managers like Redux or Riverpod(using it as a GSM and Dependencies Injectors). I have +1.5 years of experience also working as a mobile developer using Ionic/React/Typescript with Capacitor and Flutter. I have worked with both RESTful API and GraphQL API.

I have professional experience with GIT tools: git CLI, and web repositories like Github, Bitbucket, Gitlab. I have been working remotely for around two years so I have experience on JIRA, Slack, Mattermost, Discord, etc. I have experience writing documentation on Markdown language and also experience using Confluence too.

My main tech stack includes also all types of Linux/Unix Operative systems such as OsX, Ubuntu, Debian, Manjaro, etc, with experience on bash tools, etc. I have touched DevOps a bit, having experience with Docker, Jenkins, and GithubActions.

I have one year of experience working with Unreal Engine(since video games are my hobby), both with Blueprints and C++. with my own code and third-party code/plugins on small projects as and researcher.

profile_positions.description:
• Lead a 15+ development team to build functional software blocks to be integrated in cross-platform applications.
• Plan the architecture and development of features following software design patterns.
• Review code and assist developers to ensure that the code is of high quality and meets the project requirements.
• Improved the team performance by 75% getting the 80% of the job done in half of the required time; getting 20 software blocks certified in two months.
• Increase team engagement and communication by promoting the company’s code policies, periodically code review, and pair programming.

Technologies: RESTful API, React Native, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, ReactJS, Node.js, Styled Components, JSS, WebStorm, Visual Studio
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
• Implement pixel-wise new features using Figma designs and responsive design.
• Fix bugs and refactor components following refactoring principles.
• Implement unit testing (Jest) and end-to-end (E2E Cypress) testing and localization setup and tests for the application.
• Deliver MIS Pay, the first post-paid (BNPL) shopping platform with financial flexibility approved by the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
• Build a full SEO landing page using NextJS and Tailwind following the Figma designs and using Strapi as the backend (JAMStack).

Technologies: JavaScript (ES6+), ReactJS, TypeScript, MobX, RESTful APÏ, CSS3, SASS/ SCSS, Storybook, AntDesign, Cypress, Tailwind CSS, NextJS, React-Query, SEO, Strapi, WebStorm, Visual Studio Code, Figma, Git, Gitlab, SCRUM, JIRA, Slack, Zoom, Google Meet.

profile_positions.description:
Leading company in multimedia content for children, its flagship product is Pepee; As a research manager in interactive multimedia (applying gamification and video games), I performed the following responsibilities:
• Interactive media content solutions' researching.
• Solution's implementation on a game engine.
• Research and approach interactive technology solutions to expand the company's content to different platforms beyond television content.
• This includes tests with different game engines for different purposes, including among others interactive videos, video games, and virtual and augmented reality.

Technologies: Unreal Engine, C++, 3DsMax, Maya, Houdini, Photoshop, Visual Studio Code, RIder.
profile_positions.title: Interactive Media Content Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Dedicated to the development of aircraft maintenance and repair tools for clients in the USA, as in charge of the implementation of an ERP to the company's processes, my responsibilities were:
- Developing a strategy to implement Odoo ERP to manage the company's material resources and workflow.
- Collecting and integrating all required extra modules to handle the company's workflow.
- Customizing, building, and adapting plugins to the Company's production workflow.
- Planing solution architecture.
- Other different technical support in computer engineering.

Technologies: Odoo, Docker, Python, HTML, CSS, Javascript, PostgreSQL, PyCharm, Visual Studio Code.
